title: Southeast Asia: Persecuted Rohingya refugees from Myanmar suffer horrific abuses at sea (Amnesty International USA) ...
text: ( Source : Amnesty International USA ) Rohingya women, men and children attempting to flee persecution in Myammar by boat earlier this year were killed or severely beaten by human traffickers if their families failed to pay ransoms, and kept
